ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Miscellaneous small tools and utilities. Many of them facilitate the work with matrices, e.g. inserting rows or columns, creating symmetric matrices, or checking for semidefiniteness. Other tools facilitate the work with regression models, e.g. extracting the standard errors, obtaining the number of (estimated) parameters, or calculating R-squared values.

Miscellaneous small tools and utilities. Many of them facilitate the work with matrices, e.g. inserting rows or columns, creating symmetric matrices, or checking for semidefiniteness. Other tools facilitate the work with regression models, e.g. extracting the standard errors, obtaining the number of (estimated) parameters, or calculating R-squared values.

name: r-misctools
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.6-30" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-misctools
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/miscTools_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/miscTools/miscTools_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 961dd2fb2ad7aeb17082e1ced36776a5574f8a068564cb633127c78347fefd3d

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-digest
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-digest

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('miscTools')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('miscTools')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://www.micEcon.org
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Miscellaneous small tools and utilities. Many of them facilitate the work with matrices, e.g. inserting rows or columns, creating symmetric matrices, or checking for semidefiniteness. Other tools facilitate the work with regression models, e.g. extracting the standard errors, obtaining the number of (estimated)
    parameters, or calculating R-squared values.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: miscTools
# Version: 0.6-26
# Date: 2019-12-08
# Title: Miscellaneous Tools and Utilities
# Author: Arne Henningsen, Ott Toomet
# Maintainer: Arne Henningsen <arne.henningsen@gmail.com>
# Depends: R (>= 2.14.0)
# Imports: digest
# Suggests: Ecdat (>= 0.1-5)
# Description: Miscellaneous small tools and utilities. Many of them facilitate the work with matrices, e.g. inserting rows or columns, creating symmetric matrices, or checking for semidefiniteness. Other tools facilitate the work with regression models, e.g. extracting the standard errors, obtaining the number of (estimated) parameters, or calculating R-squared values.
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# URL: http://www.micEcon.org
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-12-08 08:37:45 UTC; gsl324
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-12-08 09:10:03 UTC
